snippet.title: Sleep Tight - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Sleep Tight is an arcade-style twin-stick shooter wrapped in blankets of Nostalgia. Grab your dart gun and build your pillow fort walls high, cuz it's gonna be a long night. 

Coming to Nintendo Switch and Steam 2018.

Official Site: www.sleeptightgame.com
